snippet: Paul Pasqualoni, the coach at Connecticut, will face his protégé, Steve Addazio, the second-year coach at Temple, for the first time Saturday.
abstract: Connecticut football coach Paul Pasqualoni is preparing UConn to face Temple, where his protege Steve Addazio is second-year coach.
lead_paragraph: Paul Pasqualoni, the coach at Connecticut, will face his protégé, Steve Addazio, the second-year coach at Temple, for the first time Saturday.

headline.seo: UConn Coach Pasqualoni Faces His Protégé
headline.main: With Big East as Backdrop, Connecticut Coach Faces His Protégé
headline.print_headline: With Big East as Backdrop, Connecticut Coach Faces His Protégé
